srcalc 0.9.0 API

Packages 
Package Description
gov.va.med.srcalc  
gov.va.med.srcalc.db
Data mapping between the Domain Model and the ASRC SQL database.
gov.va.med.srcalc.domain
The Domain Model.
gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.calculation
Domain objects representing calculations.
gov.va.med.srcalc.domain.model
Domain objects representing risk models, including: Variables (e.g., age, gender) Rules (e.g., an interaction between age and pneumonia) Terms (e.g., age multiplied by a coefficient) Procedures the Models themselves (e.g., Thoracic 30-day Mortality) Specialties (e.g., Thoracic) and supporting classes
gov.va.med.srcalc.security
User Authentication and Authorization
gov.va.med.srcalc.service
This is the Service Layer for the Surgical Risk Calculator, that is, the Domain Model's primary interface to the outside world.
gov.va.med.srcalc.util
General-purpose utilities for use in srcalc.
gov.va.med.srcalc.util.csv
General-purpose utilities for reading CSV files.
gov.va.med.srcalc.vista
Data mapping between the Domain Model and VistA instances.
gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.vistalink
VistALink-specific classes.
gov.va.med.srcalc.web
The Web Presentation Layer of the application.
gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller  
gov.va.med.srcalc.web.controller.admin
Controllers for administration functionality.
gov.va.med.srcalc.web.view  
gov.va.med.srcalc.web.view.admin
View classes for Administration functionality.
